subject: Re: Crystal radio technique
author: joecioppi
full_text:
--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Ray" <evp_hgte@...> wrote:
>
> Has anyone tried wiring a crystal radio set into input mic jack on pc 
> I've an idea that this could be tried using EVPmaker to boost input 
> signal.  Any other ideas regarding crystal radio anyone.
>
Ray,

I have recently built a Raudive detector into a metal 1/8 inch phone
jack for a friend, using surface mount coil and 1/8 watt resistor with
a regular crystal diode. This is basically an untuned crystal radio
and detects all radio signals at the same time.

I didn't get anything but noise for the short time I had it...but my
friend is happy.

Joe
